channel.title: Decrypt
channel.description: What's new in crypto and the advent of the decentralized web.

item.title: Crypto Owners a Growing Force Heading into 2024 Election: Galaxy Digital
item.description: Nearly one out of five voters own crypto, making them a potentially powerful constituency in November.
item.dc:creator: Ryan Kawailani Ozawa

item.title: This Week in Crypto Games: Sui Handheld, Saga Launch, Notcoin Airdrop Nears on 4/20
item.description: The Sui network is getting its own gaming handheld, Saga's mainnet and token launched, and Notcoin reveals more details for its 4/20 rollout.
item.dc:creator: Ryan Gladwin

item.title: AI or Human? Music Fans Won’t Care, Says Avenged Sevenfold Frontman
item.description: For musicians, AI is a “deeper tool” that can help stimulate creativity, said Avenged Sevenfold’s Matt Sanders (aka M. Shadows).
item.dc:creator: Stephen Graves

item.title: Crypto.com Sponsorships May Attract SEC Scrutiny—Exec Says It’s Worth the ‘Trade Off’
item.description: At the Park Hyatt in the center of Paris, Crypto.com President Eric Anziani spoke with Decrypt about regulation and his exchange’s expansions abroad.
item.dc:creator: Ben Weiss

item.title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: SEC Targets Uniswap, Bitcoin Runes Stir Hype
item.description: Never-ending legal drama kept crypto users on edge this week, while frothing excitement about the debut of Bitcoin-hosted meme coins offered degens a silver lining.
item.dc:creator: Sander Lutz

item.title: Humane AI Pin Reviews Pile On a Half-Baked Device
item.description: The makers of the first AI-first wearables made a lot of promises, and reviewers say the actual gadget falls far short.
item.dc:creator: Jose Antonio Lanz

item.title: NASA’s Next Deep Space Mission Won’t Use Artificial Intelligence
item.description: NASA says it is sticking with tried-and-true tech for its October mission to an icy moon of Jupiter.
item.dc:creator: Jason Nelson

item.title: NASA’s Next Deep Space Mission Won’t Use Artificial Intelligence
item.description: On Thursday, Decrypt Media visited NASA's Jet Propulsion Laboratory in Pasadena, CA to meet with the Engineering team behind the Europa Clipper before its launch to Jupiter's Europa moon in October.

item.title: How to Set Up a Bitcoin Node: A Guide for Beginners
item.description: As the halving cuts miner rewards in half, there are other ways to participate in the Bitcoin network. Here are the simplest ways to connect your PC.
item.dc:creator: Jason Nelson

item.title: This Week in Coins: Bitcoin Brings Entire Crypto Market Down One Week Before Halving
item.description: The W token took one of the biggest Ls, down over 30% over the past seven days.
item.dc:creator: Mathew Di Salvo

item.title: Play Games, Earn Bitcoin: The Best iOS and Android Games That Pay You BTC
item.description: You can stack up satoshis while playing Bitcoin games on iOS and Android—and these are actually fun.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Hayward

item.title: 'Match Made in Heaven': Why Ethereum RPG Kaidro Migrated to Ronin
item.description: The webcomic-based Kaidro: Clan Battles is launching on Ronin after migrating from Immutable. Here's why they moved—and what's next.
item.dc:creator: Ryan Gladwin

item.title: What is Saga? The Layer-1 Network, Upcoming Airdrop, and Game Publisher
item.description: Saga is a new layer-1 blockchain with a major gaming focus, and after launching the SAGA token, there are more airdrops and rewards to come.
item.dc:creator: Ryan Gladwin

item.title: What Is Berachain? The Latest Ethereum, Solana Challenger to Raise Big Money
item.description: Founded by pseudonymous devs with bear-themed names, Berachain is built on Cosmos SDK and aims to be the next big layer-1 chain.
item.dc:creator: Ryan Gladwin

item.title: Ethereum ETF Approval Could Come Monday—In Hong Kong: Report
item.description: The expected regulatory nod would open one of the world's largest financial markets to both spot Bitcoin and Ethereum exchange-traded funds.
item.dc:creator: Jason Nelson

item.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Solana Sink as Over $200 Million in Crypto Longs Liquidated
item.description: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Solana, and other major cryptocurrencies are down significantly as traders' long positions are being liquidated.
item.dc:creator: Mathew Di Salvo

item.title: Ideogram AI Image Generator Upgrade Stands Strong Against Midjourney and Stable Diffusion
item.description: The text-to-image generator from Google alums adds new features to close the gap with other top players—for a price.
item.dc:creator: Jose Antonio Lanz

item.title: BlackRock Bitcoin ETF Continues Rise, Crossing $15 Billion in Total Gains
item.description: BlackRock's iShares Bitcoin Trust (IBIT) has been a massive success, netting $15 billion in inflows since its January 11 launch.
item.dc:creator: Mathew Di Salvo

item.title: BitBoy One Preview: Everything You Need to Know About the Bitcoin Gaming Handheld
item.description: Another crypto gaming handheld is hitting the market, this time taking inspiration from the Game Boy. Here’s what you need to know.
item.dc:creator: Ryan Gladwin

item.title: NFTs Lag Behind Bitcoin's Boom—But Animoca's Yat Siu Is Still a Believer
item.description: At Paris Blockchain Week, Animoca Brands Chairman Yat Siu discussed SEC regulation, the resurgence of the NFT market, and his company’s financials.
item.dc:creator: Ben Weiss

item.title: The Week in Polkadot: Active Addresses Hit All-Time High
item.description: Activity in Polkadot’s ecosystem grew apace in March, while the community voted to selected IndyCar racer Conor Daly as a brand ambassador.
item.dc:creator: Decrypt Staff

item.title: Solana Congestion Fix Nears as Devs Ask Validators to 'Upgrade ASAP'
item.description: Solana developers have pushed a congestion fix to a devnet and are urging validators to "please upgrade ASAP" so it can be tested.
item.dc:creator: Stacy Elliott

item.title: Bitcoin PUPS Up 81% Amid ‘First Meme Coin’ on BTC Network Controversy
item.description: Bitcoin meme coin, PUPS, found itself in the middle of controversy with viral crypto trader Ansem colorfully coming to its defense.
item.dc:creator: Ryan Gladwin

item.title: FTX Founder Sam Bankman-Fried Appeals 25-Year Jail Sentence
item.description: The founder of collapsed crypto exchange FTX has filed an appeal to both his federal conviction and sentencing.
item.dc:creator: Stephen Graves

item.title: FBI Subpoenas 2022 Event Attendees After Theft From Bitcoin Core Dev
item.description: "The guy who wants to tell you how to use Bitcoin couldn’t even secure his own Bitcoin," a developer complained on Twitter.
item.dc:creator: Decrypt Staff

item.title: We Do A Little with Weesh
item.description: In this week’s episode, we did a little something different. We took the man who is usually behind the camera and put him in front of it. We sat down with our producer Weesh to dive into how in fell in love with art and became a collector, how he met Andy and fun childhood memories together, his biggest wins in crypto, and so much more.

item.title: Here's How Many ‘Notcoin’ Tokens You'll Get for Your In-Game Coins
item.description: Notcoin’s conversion rate has been announced ahead of the token launch on The Open Network (TON).
item.dc:creator: Andrew Hayward

item.title: Bitcoin, Sui and Solana Gaming Handhelds: Here's How They Stack Up
item.description: The BitBoy One and SuiPlay0x1 are coming to join the Solana Saga smartphone—a look at the portable crypto crypto gaming devices.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Hayward

item.title: ‘Cinematic’ Space Combat Game Nova Frontier X Counts Down to NFT Launch
item.description: A collection of 9,999 spaceship NFTs for the third-person space combat and base management game go on sale from April 16th.
item.dc:creator: Decrypt Staff

item.title: From OJ to the Queen: Why Degens Rush to Create Meme Coins When Celebrities Die
item.description: The passing of OJ Simpson spawned another surge in meme coins. What's fueling the rising trend of celebrity death-inspired crypto tokens?
item.dc:creator: Sander Lutz

item.title: Toncoin Nearly Flips Dogecoin as TON Surges
item.description: A potential IPO for Telegram has contributed to the recent surge in the price of TON, strengthening its position among the biggest tokens in crypto.
item.dc:creator: Jose Antonio Lanz

item.title: There’s a 50% Chance of Ethereum ETF Approval Next Month: JP Morgan
item.description: The banking giant is the latest to lower its expectations regarding the SEC's review of proposals to offer funds tied to the price of ETH.
item.dc:creator: Mathew Di Salvo

item.title: Metacade Unchains Web3 Gaming: Multi-Chain Integration Unites the Industry
item.description: Metacade, the leading blockchain gaming platform, takes a monumental leap forward with the integration of multi-chains into its ecosystem.
item.dc:creator: Chainwire

item.title: Bitcoin Mining Difficulty Hits All-Time High One Week Before Halving
item.description: Mining Bitcoin is now more difficult than ever before—just in time for the long-awaited halving event next week.
item.dc:creator: Mathew Di Salvo

item.title: Grayscale Bitcoin Trust Withdrawals Hit Record Low—Has the Selling Stopped?
item.description: Grayscale’s Bitcoin outflows slowed on Wednesday, though on-chain analysis suggests the fund may still bleed coins for the duration of the bull market.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Throuvalas

item.title: Chainlink Transporter to Bridge Assets Across Ethereum, Optimism, Base and More
item.description: Oracle provider, Chainlink, is connecting the blockchain with a new cross-chain bridging app promising “unmatched” security.
item.dc:creator: Ryan Gladwin

item.title: What Is Notcoin? The Telegram-Based Game, NOT Token, and Future Plans
item.description: UPDATED: The NOT token is set to launch in just over a week, and we have details about what will happen to Notcoin after that.
item.dc:creator: Reza Jafery,Andrew Hayward

item.title: Inside VanEck’s Crypto Takeover of the New York Stock Exchange
item.description: Worlds collide as Decrypt reporter Sander Lutz heads to the floor of the NYSE to witness a special closing bell ceremony hosted by VanEck in honor of Web3. Featuring Choose Rich Nick, VanEck Head of Web3 Matt Bartlett, and more!

item.title: Wormhole Wednesday
item.description: BTC hits $64.5K then rebounds, SOL outperforms. Government sends $2B BTC to Coinbase to sell. Funding rates stay low after sweep lower. ETFs see small inflow, Ark outflow more than GBTC. Wormhole W launches at $15B FDV. BTC ‘inflection point’ if it follows rates or gold. Gold & BTC very correlated for the last year. Expect slower ETF volume this month: Bloomberg. BTC 2x and 3x levered ETFs launch yesterday. BTC ETFs now half the size of gold.

item.title: First Dogs, Now Cats
item.description: BTC falls another 6% amid $400m liquidations. ETF outflows and dollar strength blamed for move. Funding completely reset to lows in move. BTC lower high leaves market in ‘no trade zone’. This cycle acting ‘nothing like previous cycle’. ETH unlikely to be classed a security: Coinbase CFO. Crypto VC funding up 53% in MarchAnsem’s cat coin sees more volume than NFT market. Most memecoins down 10-20% given move in majors. MEW up 10% after HTX lists, airdrop to Saga phones. MEME to launch memecoin chain, NFTs rise. Pixelmon releases trailer for Anime series.

item.title: We Do A Little With Spencer Gordon-Sand
item.description:
In this week’s episode, we sit down with Spencer Gordon Sand, the mastermind behind Spencer Ventures. Before launching Spencer Ventures, Spencer was a competitive fencer, Magic the gathering player, and startup enjoyooor.
We dive into Spencer’s investment thesis behind NFTs and how his fund invests, finding and buying distressed assets in a bear market , point farming optimization, a peak behind the 3AC liquidation and dickbutt buys, and so much more.

item.title: How To Get Your Foot In Ihe Door And Building During Bear Markets
item.description:
In this week’s episode, we sit down with Intern and Tunez from the Monad team. Prior to Monad, Tunez was working with Delphi Digital and Intern was working at CMS Holdings. They’re two of my oldest friends from crypto twitter.
We get into why they joined the Monad team, alpha for finding jobs in the space, biggest lessons from previous cycles, and so much more.

item.title: SBF Sentencing
item.description: BTC: 70.7k (+1%), ETH: 3585 (0%), SOL: 186 (-1%). Top 100 gainers: DOGE, GT, BCH, RBN. Crypto mixed, BTC-beta & memes outperform. SEC case vs Coinbase set to go to trial. DeFi win as case dismissed vs Coinbase wallet. ETFs see $244m inflows led by Ark. BlackRock ETF fastest growing in history: Fink. ETH ETF possible even if its a security: Fink. ETH spot ETF by May chances only 20%: GSR. SBF sentencing today, faces 50 years.

item.title: The $63 Million Exploit
item.description: BTC consolidates around $70k, funding still low. ETFs see $418m inflow as GBTC outflow tiny. BTC set to have record 7th-straight green month. AI coins soar, FET hits ATH amid merger rumour. FET, OCEAN, AGIX token proposed at $7.5bn FDV. DoJ charges KuCoin over money laundering. KuCoin sees $800m outflows after charges. CFTC names ETH & LTC commodities in charges. HK set to allow ‘in-kind’ style ETFs. HSBC launches tokenised gold fund. Fidelity files S1 form for ETH ETF. Short sellers bet $11bn crypto rally won’t last. More customer USDC balances to be stored on Base.

item.title: BTC Is Back On Top
item.description: BTC breaks $70K as $175M of shorts liquidated. ETFs see net inflow despite high GBTC outflows. Gold miner set to buy $1.7B BTC. UK to list crypto ETNs in May. ETH ETF may still be approved: Grayscale. Grayscale ETH discount falls to 22%. ETH ETF has no positive signs: Bloomberg. Coinbase pumps 10%, Ark continue to sell shares. Coinbase Int. record trading volumes in March. FTX to sell majority of Anthropic stake for $884M. Trader makes $20m profit in MEW rally. Puppets hit ATH, lead move higher in Ordinals. Azuki flips MAYC market cap in bounce. Magic Eden makes $15m in 30d trading revenue.

item.title: Base On Top
item.description: Majors continue to rally as ETF sentiment improves. Genesis have likely sold half their GBTC position. BlackRock could flip GBTC holdings in 3 weeks. BTC short squeeze would liquidate $6.6bn by $75k. Lack of on-chain activity indicates ‘limited selling’. BTC crucial to the financial system: BlackRock. Resurging interest in crypto assets: Goldman Sachs. Crypto summer has started: Raoul Pal. Base outpaces SOL & ETH for trading volumes.

item.title: ETF Outflows Continue
item.description: Despite Bitcoin's decline, several alternative cryptocurrencies remain robust. Fantom (FTM) emerges as the top-performing Layer 1 blockchain, while Coinbase introduces futures trading. Exchange-traded funds (ETFs) witness a $94 million outflow, although outflows from Grayscale Bitcoin Trust (GBTC) may decelerate. Approximately $1 billion worth of Bitcoin shorts face liquidation if prices reach $67.8k. Coinbase's premium resurfaces, marking the first occurrence since Bitcoin's all-time high. Bitcoin continues its streak with seven consecutive months of positive performance. Solana's (SOL) decentralized exchange (DEX) achieves a monthly volume of $50 billion, with revenue soaring 30-fold. OKX announces support for a new Solana token standard. Despite expectations, Layer 2 activity remains sluggish post-Dencun, according to Vitalik Buterin.

item.title: We Do A Little With Postwook
item.description:
In this week’s episode, we sit down with Natasha Chomko aka Postwook. Postwook is a Los Angeles based digital artist focused on cooking up some of the most visually pleasing and nostalgia provoking surreal landscape collage art.
We dive into Postwook’s origin story, training like an athlete as an artist, diversifying income streams, beating addiction, dealing with the ebbs and flows of being a full time artist in a volatile space, and so much more.

item.title: Scaling Ethereum and Aligning Incentives with the Chief Strategic Officer of Offchain Labs
item.description:
In this episode, we are joined by AJ Warner, the Chief Strategic Officer of Offchain Labs, the main contributors to the Arbitrum ecosystem. AJ is a gigabrain chad who joined the Offchain Labs in November 2020 and has been their CSO since January 2022.
We dive into AJ’s crypto origin story, how he joined Offchain Labs, the technical and ideological differences between Arbitrum and other scaling solutions, how the scaling solution business model works, the biggest blockers in crypto as investors and builders, and so much more.

item.title: Founding The Nifty & BoDoggos, learnings from multiple years of hosting daily shows, and leveling up the crypto content industry
item.description:
Starting Season 4 of We Do A Little with a great interview featuring Nick and Pio from The Nifty and BoDoggos.
Alongside developing their business and identity, they have consistently delivered entertaining morning shows and humorous content centered around the crypto.
In this episode, we delve into Nick and Pio’s backgrounds prior to collaborating, explore the story of their meeting, discuss their individual sources of inspiration, examine their strategic approach to expanding the Nifty team, and much more.

item.title: Vitalik Buterin Discusses Ethereum's Dencun Upgrade and More at ETH Taipei 2024
item.description: Ethereum creator Vitalik Buterin answers questions from Rug Radio and other media outlets at ETH Taipei 2024. He discusses the recent Dencun network upgrade and a variety of other topics. (Credit: Rug Radio/Decrypt)

item.title: The Weekend Madness
item.description: Bitcoin rebounds as users withdraw funds from exchanges. Solana breaks $200, surpassing Binance Coin to claim the 4th spot in crypto rankings. Ethereum's supply drops to a two-year low. Over $100 million raised by new coin presales in just two days. A dog NFT sells for a staggering $4.3 million. PRIME emerges as the leader in gaming coins, while NodeMonkes flips Bored Ape Yacht Club (BAYC).

item.title: BOME Blast off
item.description: BTC experiences a 9% drop, resulting in $700 million liquidations, with funding and open interest hitting their lowest levels in weeks. The sell-off appears more sustained compared to previous brief dips, with most BTC downside liquidations concentrated around $66,000. ETFs witness $132 million inflows, sparking predictions of a potential liquidity crisis within six months. VanEck suggests that an ETH ETF could surpass BTC in size. Grayscale's ETH discount doubles within a week. Meanwhile, SOL's market cap reaches an all-time high amid a frenzy surrounding memecoins. Additionally, rumors circulate about a fund losing $1 billion on the BTC-MicroStrategy basis.

item.title: This is The Time of SOL
item.description: ETFs match last week’s inflows in just 3 days. ETH Dencun upgrade goes, ETH coins broadly fall. ETH L2 costs for trading decrease dramatically. SOL nears $100bn FDV as activity soars. SOL DEX volume now 3x ETH mainnet. MicroStrategy plans $500m raise to buy more BTC. Franklin Templeton releases memecoin paper. AEVO faces FUD about tokenomics.

item.title: Bitcoin Hits ATH Again
item.description: Bitcoin hits a new high at $73.1k with a 2% increase, while Ethereum remains steady at $4050 and Solana sees a similar surge to $154. TON, RBN, RUNE, and QNT emerge as top gainers, capturing market attention. BTC's unprecedented rise is fueled by a record $1 billion in ETF inflows, coinciding with Ethereum's Dencun upgrade promising significant changes for Layer 2 solutions.
